PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I3) ... intransigence 不妥协态度 intransigency 不妥协态度 intransigent 非妥协性的.
近似字词-新浪字典 ... intransigence 不妥协;强硬 intransigency 不妥协;强硬 intransitive 不及物的.

list.abs: He can be intransigent and pig - headed at times ., 他有时候会很固执 , 寸步不让.

he is adamant in his refusal to change his mind ; Cynthia was inexorable ; she would have none of him-W.Churchill ; an intransigent conservative opposed to every liberal tendancy .他固执的拒绝改变自己的想法；月亮女神是坚定的，她不会接受任何一个他——W·丘吉尔；反对任何自由主义倾向的固执的保守派。
owing to their intransigent attitude we were unable to reach an agreement ., 由于他们态度僵硬 , 我们无法达成协议.
...交换意见和信息exchange views and information企硬的态度intransigent attitude向特首请愿要求他做某事petitioned the Chief Executive to do so.
They promoted an intransigent revolutionary strategy ., 他们采取一种毫不妥协的革命战略.

means.word_mean: 1. the trait of being intransigent; stubbornly refusing to compromise

auth_sentence.content: Bacteria, in particular, are quite stable when it comes to translational intransigency.
